title: Owl sculpture
description: Delicately carved from luminous white onyx, this elegant owl has a sodalite beak and wide glass eyes glaring out into the night. It stands 7 inches tall and is designed by a Peruvian gem artist to reflect the owl's radiance

title: Deer sculpture
description: Carved with surreal and elegant artistic flair, this sculpture was created by a Thai visionary who is inspired by the natural world. It's an expressive addition to a discerning household's decor

title: Two vases
description: Two Dozen Pink and Red Paper Roses in Yin-Yang Vases

title: Frog sculpture
description: Recycled Metal Tea Frog Garden Sculpture

title: Bracelet
description: Crafted in a smooth sterling silver-plated setting, this bracelet has to be the ultimate wrist bling for any fashionista. It’s ideal to wear casually, to the office or for formal events and will add charm to all your daily activities.

title: Sports mug
description: An awesome gift for the guys, our Engraved 25 ounce glass Sports Mug is guaranteed to impress - the perfect gift for Father's Day, a retirement, birthday or even a thank you gift.

title: Shot glass
description: A thoughtful and practical gift, perfect for Father’s Day, birthdays, or as a thank you to your groomsmen.

title: Jigsaw puzzle
description: This jigsaw puzzle will make a brilliant gift, whatever the occasion. It's sure to keep them amused.

title: Baseball
description: If you know a real MLB enthusiast, you've just stumbled across their ultimate gift! The leather baseball is official size, the acrylic display case measures 3 1/4 inches X 3 1/4 inches.

title: Framed print
description: Prints are created from high quality art paper on a variety of blue, grey and green backgrounds with three framing options of mahogany, white or beech. Our prints size is 18.5 inches x 14 inches.
